entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
